thread.section_title: Artmill Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Artmill | artmill.com
thread.title: Joey Lynn Resciniti
thread.title_full: Artmill reviewed by Joey Lynn Resciniti

author: Joey Lynn Resciniti
title: Joey Lynn Resciniti
text: My daughter needed a 50" wide panoramic print for a history project. Artmill was the first result on Google. I couldn't find a poster print on the web site so I started an online chat. Soon I had a Quote: on a custom project. I got a phone call to verify the size and paper before the order went into production. The print came a few days later. It was packaged like some sort of irreplaceable treasure. I would definitely use Artmill in the future. The whole experience was great!
